name: Hotaru (treesAreOp, circuitbree, Neisha)
description:
The little light spirit Hotaru was forcefully seperated and lost its other half. Help the tiny spirits become one again!

Hotaru was created as an entry for the Global Game Jam 2021. The team consisted of three developers.

Programming:

  • Circuitbree (@Circuitbree),
  • Adrian Bernhart(@TreesAreOp)

Programmer Art:

  • Jenny Neuhard (@Neisha)
